title: Microsoft Teams: Watermark support for recording playback (Premium)
description:
Watermark support available for One Player when
meeting is recorded with Watermark enabled in Teams meeting. Users should be
able to record the meeting when watermark is enabled. Once the meeting is
concluded, users can conveniently access the recorded content in One Player,
both on the web and mobile platforms. The One Player provides a seamless
playback experience with each participants seeing their own email address as
watermark, allowing users to review the meeting recording.
